lenders.loan_because: I believe in microcredit and I believe that Kiva is the most effective way for me to contribute to giving microcredit loans to people who need it. An example of criticism that has been constructive and thus led to more transparency in the way Kiva portrays itself can be found here: http://blogs.cgdev.org/open_book/2009/10/kiva-is-not-quite-what-it-seems.php

lenders.name: Sparky Firepants
lenders.loan_because:
Long ago I decided to put a certain percentage of my revenue toward improving the world.

The best way for me to do do this right now is by lending capital to assist those who have the drive to start their own businesses. Kiva allows me to do that on a global scale.

The money isn't a handout, it's a loan. That's important to me. Besides, when a person pays off their loan, I put it right into someone else's business. I decide where the money goes and I can track progress, so it feels much different than blindly sending a check and hoping for the best.
lenders.occupational_info: I create fresh, on-target illustration for fun people. My art goes on products, textiles, magazines and marketing materials.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: When your own life is great, how can you not give a little to make someone else's life better?
lenders.occupational_info: I create computer graphics for games that people play.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower people to be able to provide for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children to read and write. I also teach them about people in other countries and how we can all help one another.

lenders.name: Woods Family
lenders.loan_because: it's an easy way to practically demonstrate the love of God to others while being good stewards of our resources. We're blessed to be a blessing! Not to mention it's fun :)
lenders.occupational_info: I work with web based applications and reports that pull data from various databases. My wonderful wife takes care of our 3 precious children at home and is a huge support to our family.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to live in America where life is so good. I love loaning such a small amount and getting such big results. It's fun.
lenders.occupational_info: I struggle sometimes too. But with my original 25 dollar investment I have been able to roll it over after being paid back, and have given a hand up to four different people. There's no better feel good than that.

lenders.name: Tor Arne
lenders.loan_because: I have possibility to do that, and because I can help other peoples out of poverty.

lenders.name: Sven-Erik
lenders.loan_because: Coz I can, and coz this is one more way to change this world.
lenders.occupational_info: Guess you could say I'm a solution-finder, and a bridge-builder. I love to examening a problem and finding solutions connected with it. I'm not really an expert in much, but understand what most experts talk about, making it possible for me to build brigdes between areas/experts with less then good communication.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: Everyone, everywhere needs a little help.

lenders.name: Brittany
lenders.loan_because: One person can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a writer.
